value.name: Lompoc police release video of fatal shooting

value.name: Releases Officer Involved Shooting Video

value.name: Lompoc Releases 9-1-1 Call, Dashcam Videos From Police Shooting of Krys Ruiz
value.description: Lompoc police have released recordings of a 9-1-1 call and a series of videos related to officers’ fatal shooting of Krys Brandon Ruiz in late March. The 26-year-old was fatally wounded after 8 ...

value.name: Authorities Release Name of Person Shot, Killed by Lompoc Police
value.description: The name of the person fatally wounded by Lompoc police on Sunday night has been released. Krys Brandon Ruiz, 26, of Lompoc, was killed during the incident, police Capt. Kevin Martin said ...

value.name: Love Is Critical
value.description: Three people are killed by the police every day in our country. Tragically, Krys Brandon Ruiz of Lompoc was fatally shot by Lompoc police in March. The death of Mr. Ruiz is not unprecedented. Transgender people are face a disproportionate risk of ...
